Public Class ListView Inherits DataBoundControl Implements IDataBoundControl, IDataBoundListControl, IDataKeysControl, INamingContainer, IPageableItemContainer, IPersistedSelector, IWizardSideBarListControl

public ref class ListView : System::Web::UI::WebControls::DataBoundControl, System::Web::UI::IDataKeysControl, System::Web::UI::INamingContainer, System::Web::UI::WebControls::IDataBoundControl, System::Web::UI::WebControls::IDataBoundListControl, System::Web::UI::WebControls::IPageableItemContainer, System::Web::UI::WebControls::IPersistedSelector, System::Web::UI::WebControls::IWizardSideBarListControl

summary.span: 以使用者定義的範本來顯示資料來源值。

span.span: Displays the values of a data source by using user-defined templates.

summary.span: 控制項可讓使用者選取、排序、刪除、編輯和插入資料錄。

span.span: The control enables users to select, sort, delete, edit, and insert records.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [範本Templates](#templates) - [繫結至資料來源Binding to a Data Source](#binding_to_a_data_source) - [資料作業Data Operations](#data_operations) - [事件Events](#Events) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項用來顯示資料來源中的值。The control is used to display the values from a data source. 它類似控制，不同之處在於它使用使用者定義的範本，而不資料列欄位會顯示資料。It resembles the control, except that it displays data by using user-defined templates instead of row fields. 建立您自己的範本，讓您更有彈性地控制資料的顯示方式。Creating your own templates gives you more flexibility in controlling how the data is displayed. 原始程式碼的 Visual Studio 專案是使用本主題隨附：[下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=199759)。A Visual Studio project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=199759). 控制項支援下列功能：The control supports the following features: - 這類繫結至資料來源控制項支援， ，和。Support for binding to data source controls such as , , and . - 透過使用者定義的範本和樣式的可自訂外觀。Customizable appearance through user-defined templates and styles. - 內建的排序功能。Built-in sorting capabilities. - 內建更新和刪除功能。Built-in update and delete capabilities. - 內建插入功能。Built-in insert capabilities. - 支援的分頁功能，方法是使用控制項。Support for paging capabilities by using a control. - 內建項目選取的功能。Built-in item selection capabilities. - 以程式設計方式存取物件模型，以動態方式設定屬性、 處理事件，等等。Programmatic access to the object model to dynamically set properties, handle events, and so on. - 多個索引鍵欄位。Multiple key fields. 若要深入了解可在 ASP.NET 中其他資料繫結控制項，請參閱[資料繫結的 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9cf026e-d8b8-49f8-a3c4-64de2edbbb96)。To learn about other data-bound controls that are available in ASP.NET, see [Data-Bound Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9cf026e-d8b8-49f8-a3c4-64de2edbbb96). ## 範本Templates 為了讓控制項來顯示內容，您必須建立不同的組件的控制項範本。In order for the control to display content, you must create templates for different parts of the control. 需要。The is required. 所有其他範本是選擇性的。All other templates are optional. 不是必要屬性。The property is not required. 不過，您必須建立的範本，以及設定控制項的模式。However, you must create a template for the mode in which the control is configured. 例如，控制項必須支援插入資料錄範本所定義。For example, a control that supports inserting records must have an template defined. 下表列出您可以建立的範本控制項。The following table lists the templates that you can create for the control. |範本類型Template type|描述Description| |-------------------|-----------------| ||定義容器物件，例如根範本`table`， `div`，或`span`項目，將包含的內容中定義或範本。The root template that defines a container object, such as a `table`, `div`, or `span` element, that will contain the content defined in the or template. 它可能也包含物件。It might also contain a object.| ||定義要為個別項目顯示的資料繫結內容。Defines the data-bound content to display for individual items.| ||定義個別項目之間呈現的內容。Defines the content to render between individual items.| ||定義容器物件，例如資料表資料列 (`tr`)， `div`，或`span`項目，將包含的內容中定義和範本。Defines a container object, such as a table row (`tr`), `div`, or `span` element, that will contain the content defined in the and templates. 所指定的群組中所顯示的項目數屬性。The number of items that are displayed in a group is specified by the property.| ||定義要呈現的項目群組之間的內容。Defines the content to render between groups of items.| ||定義要針對空白項目呈現的內容項目時範本可用。Defines the content to render for an empty item when a template is used. 例如，如果屬性設定為 5，和從資料來源傳回的項目總數為 8，最後一個群組所顯示的資料控制項將會包含三個項目所指定範本，以及兩個項目依指定範本。For example, if the property is set to 5, and the total number of items returned from the data source is 8, the last group of data displayed by the control will contain three items as specified by the template, and two items as specified by the template.| ||定義要呈現，如果資料來源會不傳回任何資料的內容。Defines the content to render if the data source returns no data.| ||定義要針對選取的資料項目來區別其他項目中選取的項目呈現的內容。Defines the content to render for the selected data item to differentiate the selected item from other items.| ||定義要替代項目，讓您更輕鬆地分辨連續的項目呈現的內容。Defines the content to render for alternating items to make it easier to distinguish between consecutive items.| ||定義當正在編輯的項目来呈現的內容。Defines the content to render when an item is being edited. 樣板呈現取代正在編輯的資料項目範本。The template is rendered in place of the template for the data item that is being edited.| ||定義要插入項目呈現的內容。Defines the content to render to insert an item. 樣板呈現取代範本任一個的開頭或結尾的項目所顯示的控制項。The template is rendered in place of an template at either the start or at the end of the items that are displayed by the control. 您可以指定 where範本使用的呈現屬性控制項。You can specify where the template is rendered by using the property of the control.| 在範本中顯示的欄位值，例如，您可以使用資料繫結運算式。To display the value of a field in a template such as , you use a data-binding expression. 如需資料繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結運算式概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。For more information about data-binding expressions, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a). 若要繫結中的輸入的控制項和範本至資料來源的欄位，您可以使用雙向繫結運算式。To bind input controls in the and templates to fields of a data source, you can use two-way binding expressions. 這可讓自動擷取更新的輸入控制項的值或插入作業的控制項。This enables the control to automatically extract the values of the input control for an update or insert operation. 雙向繫結運算式也會啟用中的輸入的控制項自動顯示原始欄位值。Two-way binding expressions also enable input controls in an to automatically display the original field values. 如需雙向繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱[繫結至資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information about two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). ## 繫結至資料來源Binding to a Data Source 您可以繫結至資料來源控制項的控制項 (例如控制項或控制項) 或任何資料來源集合中實作介面，例如， ， ，或其他集合型別。You can bind the control to a data source control (such as the control or control) or to any data source collection that implements the interface, such as , , , or other collection types. 使用下列方法的其中一個繫結控制項至適當的資料來源類型：Use one of the following methods to bind the control to the appropriate data source type: - 若要繫結至資料來源控制項，將屬性控制權傳輸至資料來源控制項的值。To bind to a data source control, set the property of the control to the value of the data source control. 控制項自動繫結至指定的資料來源控制項，並可使用的資料來源控制項的功能，才能執行排序、 插入、 更新、 刪除和分頁功能。The control automatically binds to the specified data source control and can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities to perform sorting, inserting, updating, deleting, and paging functionality. 這是慣用的方法繫結至資料。This is the preferred method to bind to data. - 繫結至資料來源實作介面，以程式設計方式設定屬性控制權傳輸至資料來源，然後再呼叫方法。To bind to a data source that implements the interface, programmatically set the property of the control to the data source, and then call the method. 當您使用這項技巧，控制項不提供內建排序、 更新、 刪除和分頁功能。When you use this technique, the control does not provide built-in sorting, updating, deleting, and paging functionality. 您必須使用適當的事件來提供這項功能。You must provide this functionality by using the appropriate event. 如需資料繫結的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 資料存取內容對應](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2)。For more information about data binding, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2). > [!NOTE] > 控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。The control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 請檢查您應用程式中顯示之前從用戶端傳送可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before you display it in the application. 我們強烈建議的值是 HTML 編碼盡可能才能讓它們顯示在這個控制項。We strongly recommend that values be HTML-encoded whenever possible before they are displayed in this control. ASP.NET 提供了輸入的要求驗證功能可協助使用者輸入中的封鎖指令碼和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to help block script and HTML in user input. 您也可以使用驗證伺服器控制項來檢查使用者輸入。You can also use validation server controls to check user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[驗證控制項簡介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190)。For more information, see [Introduction to the Validation Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190). ## 資料作業Data Operations 當控制項所繫結至資料來源控制項，控制項可以讓您利用資料來源控制項的功能提供自動排序、 插入、 更新與刪除功能。When the control is bound to a data source control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic sort, insert, update, and delete functionality. > [!NOTE] > 控制項可以提供支援排序、 插入、 更新和刪除與其他類型的資料來源。The control can provide support for sorting, inserting, updating, and deleting with other types of data sources. 不過，為了實作這些作業，您必須建立程式碼中適當的事件處理常式。However, in order to implement these operations, you must create code in an appropriate event handler. 因為控制項使用的範本，它不提供自動產生按鈕，執行 update、 delete、 insert、 排序，或選取作業的方法。Because the control uses templates, it does not provide a way to automatically generate buttons to perform update, delete, insert, sort, or select operations. 您必須手動加入這些按鈕，在適當的樣板。You must manually include these buttons in the appropriate template. 控制項辨認某些按鈕其屬性設定為特定值。The control recognizes certain buttons whose property is set to a specific value. 下表列出這些按鈕的控制項辨認及其功能。The following table lists the buttons that the control recognizes and their functions. |按鈕Button|CommandName 值CommandName value|描述Description| |------------|-----------------------|-----------------| |取消Cancel|[取消]"Cancel"|取消編輯或插入作業。Cancels an edit or insert operation. 引發 事件。Raises the event.| |刪除Delete|"Delete""Delete"|將目前的資料錄從資料來源中刪除。Deletes the current record from the data source. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |選用版Select|「 選取 」"Select"|設定屬性項目的屬性值。Sets the property to the property value for the item. 呈現的項目範本。Renders the template for the item. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |EditEdit|[編輯]"Edit"|將項目置於編輯模式。Puts the item in edit mode. 呈現的項目範本。Renders the template for the item. 引發 事件。Raises the event.| |InsertInsert|「 插入 」"Insert"|插入繫結的值從到資料來源的範本。Inserts the bound values from the template into the data source. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |更新Update|「 更新 」"Update"|從繫結值來更新資料來源中目前的記錄範本。Updates the current record in the data source with the bound values from the template. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |排序Sort|「 排序 」"Sort"|排序列出的資料行`CommandArgument`按鈕的屬性。Sorts the columns listed in the `CommandArgument` property of the button. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| 不同於 [刪除] 按鈕 （這會立即刪除目前的資料項目）、 按一下 [編輯] 按鈕時，控制項會顯示目前的項目處於編輯模式。Unlike the Delete button (which deletes the current data item immediately), when the Edit button is clicked, the control displays the current item in edit mode. 在編輯模式中，內容包含在屬性會顯示目前的資料項目。In edit mode, the content that is contained in the property is displayed for the current data item. 一般而言，在編輯項目範本中，編輯 按鈕會取代的更新 和 取消 按鈕。Typically, in the edit item template, the Edit button is replaced with an Update and a Cancel button. 輸入適用於該欄位的資料類型的控制項 (例如或控制項) 通常也會顯示使用者可以修改欄位的值。Input controls that are appropriate for the field's data type (such as a or control) also usually display a field's value for a user to modify. 按一下 [更新] 按鈕更新資料來源中的記錄，並按一下 [取消] 按鈕取消編輯作業。Clicking the Update button updates the record in the data source, and clicking the Cancel button cancels the edit operation. Insert 功能已啟用時屬性設定為或。The insert functionality is enabled when the property is set to or . 此屬性會定義 where範本轉譯為插入項目。This property defines where the template is rendered for the insert item. 插入項目範本通常包括 Insert 和 取消 5d; 按鈕，並讓使用者輸入新記錄的值會顯示空白的輸入的控制項。The insert item template typically includes an Insert and a Cancel button, and empty input controls are displayed for users to enter the values for the new record. 按一下 [插入] 按鈕將記錄插入資料來源，並按一下 [取消] 按鈕會清除所有的欄位。Clicking the Insert button inserts the record in the data source, and clicking the Cancel button clears all the fields. ### 排序Sorting 控制項可讓使用者排序按鈕，即可排序的項目。The control enables users to sort the items by clicking the Sort button. 中所定義的排序功能`CommandArgument`按鈕，其中包含要排序的資料行屬性。Sort functionality is defined in the `CommandArgument` property of the button that contains the columns to be sorted. ### 分頁Paging 而不是在相同的時間，顯示資料來源的所有記錄控制項可以分為網頁的記錄。Instead of displaying all the records from the data source at the same time, the control can break the records into pages. 若要啟用分頁，將關聯用來控制控制項。To enable paging, associate a control with the control. 然後插入內控制範本。Then insert a control inside the template. 或者，如果控制項超出控制，請設定屬性的控制項。Alternatively, if the control is outside the control, set the property to the of the control. ## 事件Events 下表列出支援的事件控制項。The following table lists the events that are supported by the control. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||就會發生時 [取消] 按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Cancel") 按一下時前,控制項取消插入或編輯作業。Occurs when the Cancel button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Cancel") is clicked, but before the control cancels the insert or edit operation. 此事件通常用來停止取消作業。This event is often used to stop the cancel operation.| ||按一下 控制項中的按鈕時會發生這個事件。Occurs when a button is clicked in the control. 若要在控制項中按下按鈕時執行自訂工作通常使用這個事件。This event is often used to perform a custom task when a button is clicked in the control.| ||在建立新的項目時，就會發生控制項。Occurs when a new item is created in the control. 若要修改的項目內容時建立項目通常使用這個事件。This event is often used to modify the content of an item when the item is created.| ||中的資料繫結資料的項目時，就會發生控制項。Occurs when a data item is bound to data in the control. 此事件通常用於資料繫結項目時，修改的項目內容。This event is often used to modify the content of an item when the item is bound to data.| ||發生於刪除 按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 刪除) 按下或呼叫的方法，之後控制從資料來源中刪除記錄。Occurs when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") is clicked or the method is called, after the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用來檢查刪除作業的結果。This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.| ||發生於刪除 按鈕 (具有按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 刪除) 按下或呼叫的方法，但之前控制從資料來源中刪除記錄。Occurs when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") is clicked or the method is called, but before the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用來確認或取消刪除作業。This event is often used to confirm or cancel the delete operation.| ||發生於編輯 按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Edit") 按下時前,控制項進入編輯模式。Occurs when an Edit button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Edit") is clicked, but before the control enters edit mode. 此事件通常用來取消編輯作業。This event is often used to cancel the editing operation.| ||發生於插入按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 插入 」) 按下或呼叫的方法，之後控制項插入新的記錄從資料來源。Occurs when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") is clicked or the method is called, after the control inserts the new record from the data source. 此事件通常用於檢查插入作業的結果。This event is often used to check the results of the insert operation.| ||發生於插入按鈕 (具有按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 插入 」) 按下或呼叫的方法，但之前控制項才會插入記錄。Occurs when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") is clicked or the method is called, but before the control inserts the record. 此事件通常用於取消插入作業或變更或驗證新項目的值。This event is often used to cancel the insert operation or change or validate the values of the new item.| ||發生於更新 按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 更新 」) 按下或呼叫的方法，之後控制更新的記錄。Occurs when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") is clicked or the method is called, after the control updates the record. 若要檢查更新作業的結果通常使用這個事件。This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.| ||發生於更新 按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 更新 」) 按下或呼叫的方法，但之前控制更新的記錄。Occurs when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") is clicked or the method is called, but before the control updates the record. 此事件通常用來取消更新作業或變更或驗證的已編輯的項目值。This event is often used to cancel the updating operation or change or validate the values of the edited item.| ||在 控制項中建立 樣板時發生。Occurs when the template is created in a control. 建立範本之後執行的工作通常使用這個事件。This event is often used to perform a task after the template is created.| ||當頁面屬性變更時，在 控制項設定新的值之後發生。Occurs when the page properties change, after the control sets the new values.| ||當之前的資料頁面屬性變更時，就會發生控制項設定新的值。Occurs when the data-page properties change, but before the control sets the new values.| ||發生於選取按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Select") 按一下時，之後控制處理選取的作業。Occurs when a Select button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Select") is clicked, after the control handles the select operation. 若要在控制項中選取項目之後，執行自訂工作通常使用這個事件。This event is often used to perform a custom task after an item is selected in the control.| ||發生於選取按鈕 (具有按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Select") 按一下時前,控制處理選取的作業。Occurs when a Select button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Select") is clicked, but before the control handles the select operation. 若要取消選取的作業通常使用這個事件。This event is often used to cancel the select operation.| ||發生於排序按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 排序 」) 按下或呼叫的方法，之後控制項負責排序作業。Occurs when a Sort button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Sort") is clicked or the method is called, after the control handles the sort operation. 此事件通常用來在使用者按一下排序按鈕，和已排序資料後，執行自訂工作。This event is typically used to perform a custom task after a user clicks a Sort button and the data has been sorted.| ||發生於排序按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 排序 」) 按下或呼叫的方法，但之前控制項負責排序作業。Occurs when a Sort button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Sort") is clicked or the method is called, but before the control handles the sort operation. 若要取消排序作業，或執行自訂排序常式，通常使用這個事件。This event is often used to cancel the sorting operation or to perform a custom sorting routine.| ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用控制項來使用 HTML 表格顯示來自資料庫的記錄。The following example shows how to use the control to display records from a database by using an HTML table. 使用擷取的值是控制項。The values are retrieved by using a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來定義自訂使用者介面 (UI) 的替代資料項目。Use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the alternating data item. 範本通常包含相同的控制項和內容當作範本，但使用不同的外觀來區分的項目。The template usually contains the same controls and content as the template, but with a different appearance to distinguish items. 若要以宣告方式指定的自訂範本，將`AlternatingItemTemplate`元素內控制項。To specify the custom template declaratively, add an `AlternatingItemTemplate` element inside the control. 加入控制項和內容的開頭和結尾之間``標記。Then add controls and content between the opening and closing `` tags. 若要顯示的欄位值從資料來源，使用資料繫結運算式。To display the field values from the data source, use a data-binding expression. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結運算式概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。For more information, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a). 若要建立自動選取、 刪除和編輯作業的按鈕，將按鈕控制項加入至範本。To create buttons that automatically select, delete, and edit operations, add a button control to the template. 設定其下表中列出的屬性，以其中一個值。Set its property to one of the values listed in the following table. |按鈕類型Button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-----------------|-----------------------| |刪除Delete|"Delete""Delete"| |EditEdit|[編輯]"Edit"| |選用版Select|「 選取 」"Select"| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用範本來定義資料中替代項目樣式控制項。The following example shows how to use the template to define the style for alternating data items in a control. span.span: The name of the data field whose value is used to uniquely identify each instance of a control when ASP.NET generates the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免命名衝突，當控制項的多個執行個體以多個資料列的轉譯控制項，ASP.NET 產生唯一控制項的每個執行個體的值。To prevent naming conflicts when multiple instances of a control are rendered in multiple rows of a control, ASP.NET generates a unique value for each instance of the control. 您指定如何藉由設定產生值屬性。You specify how the value is generated by setting the property. 如果您設定屬性，ASP.NET 會產生藉由附加的尾碼，衍生自指定的資料欄位。If you set the property to , ASP.NET generates the by appending a suffix that is derived from the data field specified in . 如果未設定，尾碼是一組序號。If is not set, the suffix is a sequential number.

summary.span: 取得或設定陣列，這個陣列包含 控制項中所顯示項目的主索引鍵欄位名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets an array that contains the names of the primary key fields for the items displayed in a control.

value.span: 陣列，包含 控制項中所顯示項目的主索引鍵欄位名稱。

span.span: An array that contains the names of the primary key fields for the items displayed in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定欄位或欄位代表資料來源的主索引鍵。Use the property to specify the field or fields that represent the primary key of the data source. 若要以宣告方式設定這個屬性，請使用逗號分隔清單的欄位名稱。To set this property declaratively, use a comma-separated list of field names. 當設定屬性，則控制項就會自動填入其集合中指定的欄位或欄位的值。When the property is set, the control automatically populates its collection with the values from the specified field or fields. 這提供便利的方式來存取主索引鍵的每個項目。This provides a convenient way to access the primary keys of each item. > [!IMPORTANT] > 控制項的控制項狀態欄位中儲存索引鍵欄位值。The control stores key field values in the control-state field. 如果這些值會包含機密資訊，建議您藉由設定啟用檢視狀態加密屬性`ViewStateEncryptionMode.Always`。If these values contain sensitive information, we recommend that you enable view-state encryption by setting the property to `ViewStateEncryptionMode.Always`. 您必須設定屬性自動更新和刪除功能運作的控制項。You must set the property for the automatic updating and deleting features of the control to work. 這些索引鍵欄位的值會傳遞至資料來源控制項，以符合要更新或刪除的項目。The values of these key fields are passed to the data source control in order to match the item to update or delete. 欄位指定為資料索引鍵使用屬性更新期間傳遞給資料來源控制項，然後藉由刪除作業`Keys`集合。Fields that are specified as data keys by using the property are passed to the data source control during update and delete operations by using the `Keys` collection. 資料索引鍵欄位會傳遞至資料來源控制項，即使它們未繫結至樣板中的控制項。Data key fields are passed to the data source control even if they are not bound to controls in a template. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定資料來源的索引鍵欄位。The following example shows how to use the property to specify the key field of the data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemCommand#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemCommand/CS/ListViewItemCommandCS.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemCommand#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemCommand/VB/ListViewItemCommandVB.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定屬性，則控制項會自動建立控制項中的每個項目的物件。When the property is set, the control automatically creates a object for each item in the control. 物件包含的欄位或欄位中指定的值屬性。The object contains the values of the field or fields that are specified in the property. 物件接著會加入至控制項的集合。The objects are then added to the control's collection. 使用屬性，以擷取物件中的特定資料項目控制項。Use the property to retrieve the object for a specific data item in the control. 您可以使用屬性，以擷取目前選取項目的物件。You can use the property to retrieve the object for the currently selected item. 您也可以使用直接擷取目前選取項目的資料機碼值的屬性。You can also use the property to retrieve the data-key value for the currently selected item directly. 您可以使用屬性，以擷取的命令按鈕已按下之項目的物件。You can use the property to retrieve the object for the item for which a command button was clicked. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷資料機碼值中的項目控制項。The following example shows how to use the property to determine the data-key values for the items in a control. 它也會示範如何保留資料項目，而不是預設行為，會使用索引為基礎的使用者選項。It also shows how to preserve the user selection based on a data item instead of the default behavior that uses the index. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged/CS/ListViewItemSelectedIndexChanged2CS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged/VB/ListViewItemSelectedIndexChanged2VB.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性，以程式設計方式指定，或判斷其項目中来編輯控制項。You can use the property to programmatically specify or determine which item in a control to edit. 當這個屬性設定為在控制項中項目的索引時，該項目會顯示在編輯模式。When this property is set to the index of an item in the control, that item is displayed in edit mode. 在編輯模式中，使用轉譯該項目範本，而不要範本。In edit mode, the item is rendered by using the template instead of the template. 您可以填入與資料繫結控制項，讓使用者能夠修改項目的值。You can populate the with data-bound controls to enable users to modify values for the item. 若要切換編輯模式，以顯示模式，請將這個屬性設為-1。To switch from edit mode to display mode, set this property to -1. 您需要以程式設計方式判斷正在編輯的項目，或當您要加入自訂的編輯功能時，通常會使用屬性控制項。The property is typically used when you have to programmatically determine which item is being edited, or when you are adding custom editing functionality to the control. 控制項有一個內建的編輯功能，自動將項目置於編輯模式，如果您將按鈕加入至項目範本的屬性設定為`Edit`。The control has a built-in editing feature that automatically puts an item in edit mode if you add a button to the item template whose property is set to `Edit`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷項目是否處於編輯模式中控制項。The following example shows how to use the property to determine whether an item is in edit mode in the control. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem/CS/ListViewDataItemDataItemCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem/VB/ListViewDataItemDataItemVB.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性可編輯模式中的項目定義的自訂使用者介面 (UI)。Use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the item in edit mode. 範本通常包含輸入的控制項的使用者更新現有記錄的值。The template usually contains the input controls for the user to update the values of an existing record. 它通常也會包含更新的記錄，以及取消更新作業的按鈕。It also usually contains buttons to update the record and to cancel the update operation. 若要以宣告方式指定的自訂範本，將`EditItemTemplate`元素內控制項。To specify the custom template declaratively, add an `EditItemTemplate` element inside the control. 接著，新增內容和控制項，讓範本`EditItemTemplate`項目。Then add the contents and controls for template to the `EditItemTemplate` element. 您可以使用雙向繫結運算式，與輸入控制項關聯的欄位。You can associate a field with an input control by using a two-way binding expression. 這可讓控制項，以自動在編輯模式中的項目相關聯的輸入控制項中顯示原始欄位值。This enables the control to automatically display the original field value in the associated input control for the item in edit mode. 更新記錄時，控制項可以自動從相關聯輸入控制項擷取更新的欄位值。When a record is updated, the control can automatically extract the updated field value from the associated input control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結運算式概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。For more information, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a). 若要建立執行內建的取消和更新作業的按鈕，將按鈕控制項加入至範本。To create buttons that perform the built-in cancel and update operations, add a button control to the template. 設定其下表中列出的屬性，以其中一個值。Set its property to one of the values listed in the following table. |按鈕類型Button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-----------------|-----------------------| |取消Cancel|[取消]"Cancel"| |更新Update|「 更新 」"Update"| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何在編輯模式中定義的項目自訂範本。The following example shows how to define a custom template for the item in edit mode. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 空白的範本會顯示在控制當繫結至控制項的資料來源不包含任何記錄和屬性設定為。The empty template is displayed in a control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records and the property is set to . 而不是轉譯範本範本。The template is rendered instead of the template. 如果以外屬性設定為值、範本則不會呈現。If the property is set to a value other than , the template is not rendered. 您也可以使用空白範本定義的自訂使用者介面 (UI)屬性。You can define a custom user interface (UI) for the empty template by using the property. 若要指定自訂的範本，以宣告方式用於空白的範本，將和`EmptyDataTemplate`元素內控制項。To specify a custom template declaratively for the empty template, add and `EmptyDataTemplate` element inside the control. 然後，您可以加入至範本內容`EmptyDataTemplate`項目。You can then add the contents of the template to the `EmptyDataTemplate` element. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何定義空白範本的自訂範本。The following example shows how to define a custom template for the empty template. remarks.format: ## Remarks 空的項目會顯示在控制項時，要顯示在目前頁面的最後一個群組中沒有詳細資料項目。The empty item is displayed in a control when there are no more data items to display in the last group of the current page. 這種情形只有設定的值大於 1。This can occur only if is set to a value greater than 1. 例如，在控制項，屬性可能會設定為 5，和從資料來源傳回的項目總數為 8。For example, in a control, the property might be set to 5 and the total number of items returned from the data source is 8. 在此情況下，將最後一個資料列將包含所定義的三個項目範本和所定義的兩個項目範本。In that case, the last row of data will contain three items defined by the template and two items defined by the template. 您也可以使用空的項目定義的自訂使用者介面 (UI)屬性。You can define a custom user interface (UI) for the empty item by using the property. 若要指定空的項目以宣告方式的自訂範本，將`EmptyItemTemplate`元素內控制項。To specify a custom template declaratively for the empty item, add an `EmptyItemTemplate` element inside the control. 然後，您可以加入至範本內容`EmptyItemTemplate`項目。You can then add the contents of the template to the `EmptyItemTemplate` element. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何定義空的項目的自訂範本。The following example shows how to define a custom template for the empty item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定如何選取的資料列何時會保存控制項處於分頁模式。You can specify how selected rows are persisted when the control is in paging mode. 根據預設，資料列選取範圍以資料列索引。By default, row selection is based on row index. 每個頁面上選取相同的資料列 （例如，第三個資料列）。The same row (for example, the third row) is selected on each page. 或者，您可以啟用選取的資料列的資料索引鍵為基礎的持續性。Alternatively, you can enable persistence based on the data key of the selected row. 在此情況下，如果您選取第 1 頁上的資料列 3，而且您移動到第 2 頁，會不選取任何資料列在第 2 頁。In that case, if you select row 3 on page 1 and you move to page 2, no row is selected on page 2. 如果您移回至頁面 1，3 的資料列已選取。If you move back to page 1, row 3 is still selected. 若要啟用這項功能，請將此屬性設定為`true`。To enable this functionality, set this property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 在 2.0、 3.0 和 3.5 版的 ASP.NET，只以資料列索引為基礎選取資料列。In versions 2.0, 3.0, and 3.5 of ASP.NET, row selection was based only on row index. 根據預設，ASP.NET 4 中的資料列選取範圍根據回溯相容性的索引。By default, row selection in ASP.NET 4 is based on index for backward compatibility.

span.span: The number of items to display per group in a control.

value.span: 預設為 1，表示 控制項會在每一個群組中顯示一個項目。

span.span: The default is 1, which indicates that the control will display one item per group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要在中分組的項目數控制項。Use the property to specify the number of items to be grouped together in the control. （換句話說，這會指定要顯示控制項的每個群組的項目數目。）每個群組、控制項呈現的內容範本和項目預留位置取代為實際的項目內容。(In other words, this specifies the number of items to display for each group of the control.) For each group, the control renders the contents of the template and replaces the item placeholder with the actual item content. 它會按照次數所定義的項目數目屬性。It does this as many times as the number of items defined by the property. 您可以使用與範本來建立在並排顯示版面配置控制項。You can use with the template to create a tiled layout in the control. 在並排顯示的資料表配置中，項目會水平資料列中重複。In a tiled table layout, the items are repeated horizontally in a row. 所指定的數字的項目重複的次數屬性。The numbers of times that an item is repeated is specified by the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立在並排顯示版面配置控制項使用屬性。The following example shows how to create a tiled layout in the control by using the property. 它也會示範如何以程式設計方式變更這個屬性。It also shows how to change this property programmatically. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupItemCount#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupItemCount/CS/ListViewGroupItemCountCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupItemCount#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupItemCount/VB/ListViewGroupItemCountVB.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 屬性會設定為小於 1 的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value less than 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分隔符號，可讓您將每個群組之間的自訂內容的項目。The separator enables you to put an element that has custom content between each group. 控制項則或者呈現內容和內容。The control then alternately renders the content and the content. 內容永遠會轉譯上一次。The content is always rendered last. 請確定您定義的內容中的整個資料列範本，因為控制呈現內容內範本。Make sure that you define the content for the whole row in the template, because the control renders the content inside the template. 例如，在群組控制項可能會建立使用資料表資料列 (`tr`) 項目。For example, the groups in the control might be created by using a table row (`tr`) element. 如果屬性設定為 3，`colspan`屬性必須設定為 3 的範本。If the property is set to 3, the `colspan` attribute must be set to 3 in the template. 若要指定的範本，以宣告方式做為分隔符號，將`GroupSeparatorTemplate`元素內控制項。To specify a template declaratively for the separator, add a `GroupSeparatorTemplate` element inside the control. 然後，您可以加入至範本內容`GroupSeparatorTemplate`項目。You can then add the contents of the template to the `GroupSeparatorTemplate` element. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立在群組分隔符號控制項使用屬性。The following example shows how to create a group separator in the control by using the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性以建立在並排顯示版面配置控制項。Use the property to create a tiled layout in the control. 在並排顯示的資料表配置中，項目會水平資料列中重複。In a tiled table layout, the items are repeated horizontally in a row. 所指定的數字的項目重複的次數屬性。The numbers of times that an item is repeated is specified by the property. 若要指定以宣告方式群組容器的範本，將`GroupTemplate`元素內控制項。To specify a template declaratively for the group container, add a `GroupTemplate` element inside the control. 然後，您可以加入至範本內容`GroupTemplate`項目。You can then add the contents of the template to the `GroupTemplate` element. 屬性必須包含的資料項目，例如資料表資料格的預留位置 (`td`)， `div`，或`span`項目。The property must include a placeholder for the data item, such as a table cell (`td`), `div`, or `span` element. 必須要有這個預留位置`runat`屬性設為 「 伺服器 」 而`ID`屬性值設定為屬性。This placeholder must have the `runat` attribute set to "server" and the `ID` attribute set to the value of the property. 在執行階段，控制項以針對每個項目所定義的內容取代預留位置和範本。At run time, the control replaces the placeholder with the content that is defined for each item in the and templates. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立在並排顯示版面配置控制項使用屬性。The following example shows how to create a tiled layout in the control by using the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出可用的項目位置值。The following table lists the available item position values. |資料列型別Row type|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||呈現範本中的第一個項目為控制項。Renders the template as the first item in the control.| ||呈現範本中的最後一個項目為控制項。Renders the template as the last item in the control.| ||不會呈現範本。Does not render the template.| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定控制項來顯示範本。The following example shows how to configure a control to display the template. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分事件。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來定義自訂使用者介面 (UI) 中插入項目的控制項。Use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the insert item in the control. 此 UI 呈現的開頭或結尾的顯示項目。This UI is rendered either at the start or at the end of the displayed items. 您可以指定其中使用的呈現 UI屬性。You specify where the UI is rendered by using the property. 範本通常包含輸入的控制項和使用者輸入新記錄的值。The template usually contains the input controls for the user to enter the values for a new record. 通常也會包含按鈕或插入資料錄，以及取消插入作業的超連結。It also usually contains buttons or hyperlinks to insert the record and to cancel the insert operation. 若要以宣告方式指定的自訂範本，將`InsertItemTemplate`元素內`ListView`項目。To specify the custom template declaratively, add an `InsertItemTemplate` element inside the `ListView` element. 然後，您可以加入至範本內容`InsertItemTemplate`項目。You can then add the contents of the template to the `InsertItemTemplate` element. 您可以使用雙向繫結運算式，與輸入控制項關聯的欄位。You can associate a field with an input control by using a two-way binding expression. 插入一筆記錄、控制項自動擷取的欄位值相關聯輸入控制項。When a record is inserted, the control automatically extracts the field value from the associated input control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結運算式概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。For more information, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a). 若要建立執行內建的取消和插入作業的按鈕，將按鈕控制項加入至範本。To create buttons that perform the built-in cancel and insert operations, add a button control to the template. 設定其下表中列出的屬性，以其中一個值。Set its property to one of the values listed in the following table. |按鈕類型Button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-----------------|-----------------------| |取消Cancel|[取消]"Cancel"| |InsertInsert|「 插入 」"Insert"| 您可以控制的位置中插入項目的控制項使用屬性。You can control the position of the insert item in the control by using the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何定義的自訂範本的插入項目控制項。The following example shows how to define a custom template for the insert item of a control. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分事件。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來以程式設計方式插入資料來源中的項目。Use the method to programmatically insert an item in the data source. 這個方法通常用來插入外部的項目從控制，例如來自不同頁面上的控制項。This method is typically used to insert an item from outside the control, such as from a different control on the page. 若要使用方法，您必須定義中的範本控制項。To use the method, you must define an template in the control. 您也必須設定屬性設為不同值。You must also set the property to a value different from . 若要指定是否要將頁面驗證執行插入作業之前，請使用`causesValidation`參數。To specify whether page validation is performed before the insert operation, use the `causesValidation` parameter. 這個方法會引發和事件。This method raises the and events. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法，以程式設計的方式插入的插入項目的內容到資料來源的控制項。The following example shows how to use the method to programmatically insert the contents of the insert item of a control into the data source. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 當要求取消作業時，但是在 控制項取消插入或編輯作業之前發生。

span.span: Occurs when a cancel operation is requested, but before the control cancels the insert or edit operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件中的 [取消] 按鈕時或按一下的範本，但之前控制項取消插入或編輯作業。The control raises the event when a Cancel button in the or template is clicked, but before the control cancels the insert or edit operation. (取消按鈕定義不的按鈕控制項屬性設定為"Cancel"。)這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如停止取消作業，如果項目置於不良的狀態。(A Cancel button is a button control whose property is set to "Cancel".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the item in an unwanted state. A物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷項目的索引。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the index of the item. 它也可讓您指出應該取消作業。It also lets you indicate that the cancel operation should be stopped. 若要停止作業，請設定屬性物件`true`。To stop the operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立事件處理常式。The following example shows how to create an event handler. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含文字的方塊可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains text boxes that accept user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling/CS/ListViewItemCancelingCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling/VB/ListViewItemCancelingVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 當按一下 控制項中的按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a button in a control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的按鈕時引發事件按一下控制項時。The event is raised when a button in the control is clicked. 這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件。This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 在按鈕控制項也可以叫用控制項的內建功能。Buttons in a control can also invoke built-in functionality of the control. 下表列出您可以搭配使用的值才能叫用內建功能按鈕的屬性。The following table lists values that you can use with the property of a button in order to invoke built-in functionality. |CommandName 值CommandName value|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |[取消]"Cancel"|取消編輯或插入作業。Cancels an edit or insert operation. 引發 事件。Raises the event.| |"Delete""Delete"|將目前的資料錄從資料來源中刪除。Deletes the current record from the data source. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |「 選取 」"Select"|設定屬性項目的屬性值。Sets the property to the property value for the item. 呈現的項目範本。Renders the template for the item. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |[編輯]"Edit"|將項目置於編輯模式。Puts the item in edit mode. 呈現的項目範本。Renders the template for the item. 引發 事件。Raises the event.| |「 插入 」"Insert"|插入繫結的值從到資料來源的範本。Inserts the bound values from the template into the data source. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |「 更新 」"Update"|從繫結值來更新資料來源中目前的記錄範本。Updates the current record in the data source with the bound values from the template. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |「 排序 」"Sort"|排序列出的資料行`CommandArgument`按鈕的屬性。Sorts the columns listed in the `CommandArgument` property of the button. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| 上表中所列按鈕時，也會引發事件。The event is also raised when a button that is listed in the previous table is clicked. 不過，建議您使用列在資料表中的事件。However, it is recommended that you use the events listed in the table. 事件通常用來處理自訂作業。The event is usually used to handle custom operations. A物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷已按下按鈕的命令引數與命令的名稱。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the command name and command argument of the button that was clicked. 若要判斷命令名稱，請使用屬性。To determine the command name, use the property. 若要判斷此命令引數，請使用屬性。To determine the command argument, use the property. 若要存取控制項引發事件，請使用屬性。To access the control that raised the event, use the property. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立事件處理常式。The following example shows how to create an event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemCommand/CS/ListViewItemCommandCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemCommand/VB/ListViewItemCommandVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在 控制項中建立項目時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an item is created in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前可以呈現控制項，必須針對每個控制項中的項目建立物件。Before the control can be rendered, a object must be created for each item in the control. 就會引發事件時每個項目中建立控制項。The event is raised when each item in the control is created. 這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如將自訂內容新增到項目。This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as adding custom content to an item. A物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您存取正在建立之項目的屬性。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to access the properties of the item that is being created. 若要存取特定的控制項項目中，使用方法中所包含的物件屬性物件。To access a specific control in the item, use the method of the object that is contained in the property of the object. 您可以判斷哪一個項目類型 （資料項目，插入項目，空的項目） 由使用所建立屬性。You can determine which item type (data item, insert item, empty item) is being created by using the property. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

summary.span: 當資料項目繫結至 控制項中的資料時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a data item is bound to data in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前可以呈現控制項，控制項中的每個項目必須繫結至資料來源中的記錄。Before the control can be rendered, each item in the control must be bound to a record in the data source. 資料項目所繫結中的資料時，就會引發事件控制項。The event is raised when a data item is bound to data in the control. (資料項目都由物件。)這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如修改的資料繫結項目的值。(Data items are represented by objects.) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as modifying the values of the data that is bound to the item. A物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您存取繫結項目的屬性。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to access the properties of the item that is being bound. 若要存取特定的控制項項目中，使用方法中所包含的物件屬性物件。To access a specific control in the item, use the method of the object that is contained in the property of the object. 您可以判斷哪一個項目類型 （資料項目，插入項目，空的項目） 所使用繫結屬性。You can determine which item type (data item, insert item, empty item) is being bound by using the property. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何使用 事件。The following example shows how to use the event. summary.span: 當要求刪除作業時，在 控制項刪除項目之後發生。

span.span: Occurs when a delete operation is requested, after the control deletes the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在按下的項目 [刪除] 按鈕時，會引發事件或呼叫的方法，之後控制刪除的項目。The event is raised when an item's Delete button is clicked or the method is called, after the control deletes the item. ([刪除] 按鈕就是 屬性設定為 "Delete" 的按鈕控制項)。這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如檢查刪除作業的結果。(A Delete button is a button control whose property is set to "Delete".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of the delete operation. A物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷資料來源中受到影響的資料列數目。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the number of rows that were affected in the data source. 它也可讓您判斷可能發生哪些例外狀況。It also lets you determine what exceptions might have occurred. 您可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式設定屬性物件`true`。You can indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the property of the object to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何加入事件處理常式事件。The following example shows how to add an event handler for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/ListViewDeletedEventArgsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/ListViewDeletedEventArgsVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 當要求刪除作業時，但是在 控制項刪除項目之前發生。

span.span: Occurs when a delete operation is requested, but before the control deletes the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在按下的項目 [刪除] 按鈕時，會引發事件或呼叫的方法，但之前控制刪除的項目。The event is raised when an item's Delete button is clicked or the method is called, but before the control deletes the item. ([刪除] 按鈕就是 屬性設定為 "Delete" 的按鈕控制項)。這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如取消刪除作業。(A Delete button is a button control whose property is set to "Delete".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the delete operation. A物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷目前的項目索引。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the index of the current item. 它也可讓您指出應該取消刪除作業。It also lets you indicate that the delete operation should be canceled. 若要取消刪除作業，請設定屬性物件`true`。To cancel the delete operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 您也可以使用和之前的值會傳遞至資料來源的集合。You can also work with the and collections before the values are passed to the data source. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以宣告方式將加入的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows how to declaratively add an event handler for the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目的 [編輯] 按鈕按一下時前,，會引發事件項目置於編輯模式。The event is raised when an item's Edit button is clicked, but before the item is put in edit mode. ([編輯] 按鈕就是 屬性設定為 "Edit" 的按鈕控制項)。這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如取消編輯作業。(An Edit button is a button control whose property is set to "Edit".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the edit operation. A物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷目前的項目索引。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the index of the current item. 它也可讓您指出應該取消編輯作業。It also lets you indicate that the edit operation should be canceled. 若要取消的編輯作業，請設定屬性物件`true`。To cancel the edit operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何加入事件處理常式事件。The following example shows how to add an event handler for the event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). span.span: Occurs when an insert operation is requested, after the control has inserted the item in the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件中的 [插入] 按鈕時範本已按下或呼叫的方法，之後控制項插入資料來源中的項目。The control raises the event when an Insert button in the template is clicked or the method is called, after the control inserts the item in the data source. (插入按鈕是的按鈕控制項屬性設定為 「 插入 」。)這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如檢查插入作業的結果。(An Insert button is a button control whose property is set to "Insert".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of an insert operation. A物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷受影響的記錄數目。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the number of records affected. 它也可讓您判斷可能發生哪些例外狀況。It also lets you determine what exceptions might have occurred. 若要判斷的插入作業所影響的記錄數目，請使用屬性。To determine the number of records that were affected by the insert operation, use the property. 若要判斷是否有發生任何例外狀況，請使用屬性。To determine whether any exceptions occurred, use the property. 您還可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式設定屬性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the property. 如果您想要存取插入記錄的值，使用屬性。If you want to access the values of the inserted record, use the property. 如果屬性報告的任何項目已插入，插入值，若要重新繫結藉由設定範本屬性`true`。If the property reports that no items were inserted, you can rebind the insert values to the template by setting the property to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何加入事件處理常式事件。The following example shows how to add an event handler for the event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件中的 [插入] 按鈕時範本已按下或呼叫的方法，但之前控制項才會插入記錄。The control raises the event when an Insert button in the template is clicked or the method is called, but before the control inserts the record. (插入按鈕是的按鈕控制項屬性設定為 「 插入 」。)這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如 HTML 編碼方式記錄的值之前將它插入資料來源中。(An Insert button is a button control whose property is set to "Insert".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as HTML-encoding the values of a record before it is inserted in the data source. A物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷值的選擇性命令引數傳送至控制項。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the value of an optional command argument sent to the control. 它也可讓您指出應該取消插入作業。It also lets you indicate that the insert operation should be canceled. 若要取消的插入作業，請設定屬性`true`。To cancel the insert operation, set the property to `true`. 您可以讀取或修改新記錄的欄位值使用屬性。You can read or modify the field values for the new record by using the property. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何加入事件處理常式事件。The following example shows how to add an event handler for the event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含控制項可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains controls that accept user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來存放區中的資料項目控制項。The property is used to store the data items in a control. 控制項就會自動填入集合建立一個物件目前的資料來源中的資料頁中的每一筆記錄。The control automatically populates the collection by creating one object for each record in the current page of data in the data source. 然後，它會將每個物件加入集合。It then adds each object to the collection. 這個屬性通常用來存取控制項中的特定項目或逐一完成項目的集合。This property is usually used to access a specific item in the control or to iterate though the complete collection of items. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用存取正在編輯的項目集合控制項。The following example shows how to use the collection to access the item that is being edited in a control. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分事件。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the event. span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來定義自訂使用者介面 (UI) 顯示資料的項目。Use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) to display the data items. 範本所需的控制項。The template is required by the control. 它通常包含控制項以顯示記錄的欄位值。It usually contains controls to display the field values of a record. 如果您想要讓使用者修改的資料，您通常也會加入按鈕，範本可讓使用者選取的記錄、 切換至編輯模式，或刪除記錄。If you want to let users modify the data, you also usually add buttons to the template that let the user select a record, switch to edit mode, or delete a record. 若要以宣告方式指定的自訂範本，將`ItemTemplate`元素內控制項。To specify the custom template declaratively, add an `ItemTemplate` element inside the control. 然後，您可以加入至範本內容`ItemTemplate`項目。You can then add the contents of the template to the `ItemTemplate` element. 若要顯示資料來源繫結至控制項的欄位值，請使用資料繫結運算式。To display the field values of the data source that is bound to the control, use a data-binding expression. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結運算式概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。For more information, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a). 若要建立執行內建的選取的按鈕，刪除和編輯作業的按鈕控制項加入至範本。To create buttons that perform the built-in select, delete, and edit operations, add a button control to the template. 設定其下表中列出的屬性，以其中一個值。Set its property to one of the values listed in the following table. |按鈕類型Button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-----------------|-----------------------| |刪除Delete|"Delete""Delete"| |EditEdit|[編輯]"Edit"| |選用版Select|「 選取 」"Select"| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何定義中的資料項目的自訂範本控制項。The following example shows how to define a custom template for a data item in the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 當要求更新作業時，在 控制項更新項目之後發生。

span.span: Occurs when an update operation is requested, after the control updates the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在按下的項目 [更新] 按鈕時，會引發事件或呼叫的方法，之後控制更新的項目。The event is raised when an item's Update button is clicked or the method is called, after the control updates the item. (的按鈕控制項的更新 按鈕是屬性設定為 「 更新 」。)這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如檢查更新作業的結果。(An Update button is a button control whose property is set to "Update".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of the update operation. A物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷受影響的資料列數目。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the number of rows affected. 它也可讓您判斷可能發生哪些例外狀況。It also lets you determine what exceptions might have occurred. 您可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式設定屬性物件。You can indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the property of the object. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何加入事件處理常式事件。The following example shows how to add an event handler for the event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). span.span: Occurs when an update operation is requested, but before the control updates the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在按下的項目 [更新] 按鈕時，會引發事件或呼叫的方法，但之前控制更新的項目。The event is raised when an item's Update button is clicked or the method is called, but before the control updates the item. (的按鈕控制項的更新 按鈕是屬性設定為 「 更新 」。)這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如取消更新作業。(An Update button is a button control whose property is set to "Update".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the update operation. A物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷目前的項目索引。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the index of the current item. 它也可讓您指出應該取消更新作業。It also lets you indicate that the update operation should be canceled. 若要取消更新作業，請設定屬性物件`true`。To cancel the update operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 您可以使用， ，和之前的值會傳遞至資料來源的集合。You can work with the , , and collections before the values are passed to the data source. 使用這些集合的典型方式是將 HTML 編碼再將它們儲存在資料來源中，使用者所提供的值。A typical way to use these collections is to HTML-encode the values supplied by the user before they are stored in the data source. 這有助於防止指令碼資料隱碼攻擊。This helps prevent script injection attacks. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何加入事件處理常式事件。The following example shows how to add an event handler for the event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來定義自訂使用者介面 (UI) 的根容器控制項。Use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the root container of the control. 若要指定的版面配置範本，將`LayoutTemplate`元素內控制項。To specify the layout template, add a `LayoutTemplate` element inside the control. 然後，您可以加入至範本內容`LayoutTemplate`項目。You can then add the contents of the template to the `LayoutTemplate` element. 內容必須包含預留位置的控制項，例如資料表資料列 (`tr`) 所定義之項目的項目範本所定義的群組或範本。The content must include a placeholder control such as a table row (`tr`) element for the items that are defined by the template or for groups that are defined by the template. 預留位置控制項都必須有`runat`屬性設為 「 伺服器 」 而`ID`屬性值設定為或屬性，取決於是否控制項使用群組。The placeholder control must have the `runat` attribute set to "server" and the `ID` attribute set to the value of the or the property, depending on whether the control is using groups. 範本並不需要的控制項。The template is not required by the control. 您可以使用控制，而和也不預留位置伺服器控制項，並提供已知的識別碼。You can use the control without a and also without a placeholder server control with a known ID. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何定義根容器中的自訂範本控制項。The following example shows how to define a custom template for the root container in the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate/CS/ListViewEditItemTemplateCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate/VB/ListViewEditItemTemplateVB.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範如何使用不定義控制控制項中的範本。The following example shows how to use the control without defining a template in the control. 具有已知識別碼的伺服器控制項也未指定。A server control with a known ID is also not specified. ``` <% Eval("LastName")%> ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由控制項來選擇性地處理在控制項階層架構會傳遞的事件。The method is used by the control to optionally handle events that are passed up through the control hierarchy. 它會判斷是否要檢查的內容來處理事件中所包含的物件`e`參數。It determines whether to handle an event by examining the properties of the object that are contained in the `e` parameter. 當必須處理事件時，此方法會執行適當的動作。When an event must be handled, the method performs the appropriate action. 會忽略其他事件，並在控制項階層架構中向上傳遞。Other events are ignored and passed up the control hierarchy. 這個方法的傳回值會指出是否處理事件，或將事件控制項階層架構中向上傳遞。The return value of this method indicates whether to handle the event or to pass the event up the control hierarchy. Control 覆寫此方法以執行適當的動作，當按一下按鈕控制項所能辨識的其中一個基底實作。The control overrides the base implementation of this method to perform the appropriate action when one of the buttons that is recognized by the control is clicked. 下表列出這些按鈕的控制項辨認。The following table lists the buttons that the control recognizes. |CommandName 值CommandName value|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |[取消]"Cancel"|取消編輯或插入作業。Cancels an edit or insert operation. 引發 事件。Raises the event.| |"Delete""Delete"|將目前的資料錄從資料來源中刪除。Deletes the current record from the data source. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |「 選取 」"Select"|設定屬性項目的屬性值。Sets the property to the property value for the item. 呈現的項目範本。Renders the template for the item. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |[編輯]"Edit"|將項目置於編輯模式。Puts the item in edit mode. 呈現的項目範本。Renders the template for the item. 引發 事件。Raises the event.| |「 插入 」"Insert"|插入繫結的值從到資料來源的範本。Inserts the bound values from the template into the data source. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |「 更新 」"Update"|從繫結值來更新資料來源中目前的記錄範本。Updates the current record in the data source with the bound values from the template. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |「 排序 」"Sort"|排序列出的資料行`CommandArgument`按鈕的屬性。Sorts the columns listed in the `CommandArgument` property of the button. 引發和事件。Raises the and events.| 這個版本的方法會傳回`true`如果其中一個這些按鈕會引發的事件由控制項處理。This version of the method returns `true` if one of these buttons raises an event that is handled by the control. 如需事件反昇的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event bubbling, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當通知由這個方法時，Web 伺服器控制項都必須執行建立及設定執行個體所需的任何初始化步驟。When notified by this method, Web server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 在此階段的伺服器控制項的生命週期中，控制項的檢視狀態有尚未填入。In this stage of the server control's life cycle, the control's view state has not yet been populated. 此外，您無法存取其他伺服器控制項，這個方法呼叫時，無論它是子系或控制項的父系。Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent of this control. 不保證會建立並準備好存取其他伺服器控制項。Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 當您覆寫衍生類別中呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When you override in a derived class, call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發按一下事件，當控制項中的 [取消] 按鈕時，但結束前，插入或編輯模式。The control raises the event when a Cancel button in the control is clicked, but before exiting insert or edit mode. (取消按鈕定義不的按鈕控制項屬性設定為"Cancel"。)這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如停止取消作業，如果項目置於不良的狀態。(A Cancel button is a button control whose property is set to "Cancel".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the item in an unwanted state. 方法透過呼叫控制項引發事件。The method is called by the control to raise the event. 擴充時，它通常會由控制項開發人員用類別。It is typically used by control developers when extending the class. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前可以呈現控制項，控制項中的每個項目必須繫結至資料來源中的記錄。Before the control can be rendered, each item in the control must be bound to a record in the data source. 就會引發事件時物件繫結至資料的項目。The event is raised when a object is bound to a data item. 這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如繫結程序期間修改之資料項目的值。This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as modifying the values of the data item during the binding process. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定屬性，則控制項建立物件每個項目在控制項中使用的值或指定的欄位或欄位的值。When the property is set, the control creates a object for each item in the control by using the value or values of the specified field or fields. 物件接著會加入至控制項的集合。The objects are then added to the control's collection. 一般來說，屬性用來擷取物件中的特定資料項目控制項。Normally, the property is used to retrieve the object for a specific data item in the control. 不過，如果您想要只擷取物件的目前選取項目，您可以使用較快速的屬性。However, if you want to retrieve only the object of the currently selected item, you can use the property as a shortcut. 使用屬性等同於擷取物件從集合所指定的索引處屬性。Using the property is the same as retrieving the object from the collection at the index that is specified by the property. 您也可以使用直接擷取目前選取項目的資料機碼值的屬性。You can also use the property to retrieve the data-key value for the currently selected item directly. 如果您要建立物件，而且您想要存取的第一個欄位以外的索引鍵欄位，請使用索引屬性屬性物件。If you are creating a object and you want to access a key field other than the first field, use the indexed property in the property of the object. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用第二個索引鍵欄位做的主要/詳細資料案例中的參數。The following example shows how to use the second key field as a parameter in a master/detail scenario. A控制項用來顯示產品存貨資料表的 AdventureWorks 資料庫中的記錄。A control is used to display records from the Product Inventory table of the AdventureWorks database. 當選取的項目控制項，產品的詳細資料會顯示在另一個控制項。When an item is selected in the control, the details of the product are displayed in another control. ProductID 為第二個索引鍵名稱在第一個控制項。ProductID is the second key name in the first control. 若要存取的第二個索引鍵，程式碼使用的值`ProductInventoryListView.SelectedDataKey[1]`(`ProductInventoryListView.SelectedDataKey(1)`在 Visual Basic 中) 做為如物件。To access the second key, the code uses the value of `ProductInventoryListView.SelectedDataKey[1]` (`ProductInventoryListView.SelectedDataKey(1)` in Visual Basic) as the for the object. 接著使用此參數物件控制的第二個控制項繫結。This parameter object is in turn used by the control that the second control is bound to. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedDataKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedDataKey/CS/ListViewSelectedDataKeyCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedDataKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedDataKey/VB/ListViewSelectedDataKeyVB.aspx#1)]

(不過，如果您以手動方式進行資料繫結控制項，您可能必須讀取或設定這個屬性也以手動方式處理。)(However, if you manually data-bind the control, you might have to handle reading or setting this property manually as well.) ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷是否已選取一個項目控制項。The following example shows how to use the property to determine whether an item is selected in a control. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分方法。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the method. summary.span: 當按一下項目的 [選取] 按鈕時，在 控制項處理選取作業之後發生。

span.span: Occurs when an item's Select button is clicked, after the control handles the select operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時選取的項目 按鈕按一下時，之後會引發事件控制處理選取的作業。The event is raised when an item's Select button is clicked, after the control handles the select operation. (選取按鈕時的按鈕控制項屬性設定為"Select"。)這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如狀態標籤更新目前選取的項目相關資訊。(A Select button is a button control whose property is set to "Select".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as updating a status label with information about the currently selected item. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何建立事件處理常式事件。The following example shows how create an event handler for the event. summary.span: 當按一下項目的 [選取] 按鈕時，但是在 控制項處理選取作業之後發生。

span.span: Occurs when an item's Select button is clicked, but before the control handles the select operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時選取的項目 按鈕按一下時，之前引發事件控制處理選取的作業。The event is raised when an item's Select button is clicked, but before the control handles the select operation. (選取按鈕時的按鈕控制項屬性設定為"Select"。)這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如取消選取作業。(A Select button is a button control whose property is set to "Select".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the select operation. > [!NOTE] > 當您以程式設計方式設定時，不會引發這個事件屬性。This event is not raised when you programmatically set the property. A物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷使用者所選取項目的索引。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the index of the item that was selected by the user. 它也可讓您指出應該取消選取作業。It also lets you indicate that the selection operation should be canceled. 若要取消選取作業，請設定屬性物件`true`。To cancel the selection operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何建立事件處理常式事件。The following example shows how create an event handler for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging/CS/ListViewItemSelectedIndexChangingCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging/VB/ListViewItemSelectedIndexChangingVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來定義自訂使用者介面 (UI) 中的選取項目控制項。Use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the selected item in a control. 通常用來區別其他顯示項目中選取的項目。The is usually used to differentiate the selected item from the other displayed items. 而不是轉譯的選取項目範本。 is rendered instead of the template for the selected item. 若要以宣告方式指定的自訂範本，將`SelectedItemTemplate`元素內控制項。To specify the custom template declaratively, add a `SelectedItemTemplate` element inside the control. 然後，您可以加入至範本內容`SelectedItemTemplate`項目。You can then add the contents of the template to the `SelectedItemTemplate` element. 若要顯示資料來源繫結至控制項的欄位值，請使用資料繫結運算式。To display the field values of the data source that is bound to the control, use a data-binding expression. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結運算式概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。For more information, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a). 您也可以加入至按鈕。You can also add buttons to the . 若要建立執行內建的刪除或編輯作業的按鈕，將按鈕控制項加入至範本，並將其下表中列出的屬性，以其中一個值。To create buttons that perform the built-in delete or edit operations, add a button control to the template and set its property to one of the values listed in the following table. |按鈕類型Button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-----------------|-----------------------| |刪除Delete|"Delete""Delete"| |EditEdit|[編輯]"Edit"| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性定義中的選取項目內容控制項。The following example shows how to use the property to define the contents of the selected item in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemDeleting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemDeleting/CS/ListViewItemItemDeletingCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemDeleting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemDeleting/VB/ListViewItemItemDeletingVB.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷索引鍵欄位的值。The following example shows how to use the property to determine the value of the key field.
