remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來以程式設計的方式排序資料，會顯示在控制項使用指定的排序運算式和方向。Use the method to programmatically sort the data that is displayed in the control by using the specified sort expression and direction. 排序運算式指定要排序的資料行的資料行。The sort expression specifies the column or columns to sort with. 若要排序多個資料行，建立包含以逗號分隔的欄位名稱清單的排序運算式。To sort multiple columns, create a sort expression that contains a comma-separated list of field names. 排序方向會指出是否執行排序以遞增或遞減的順序。The sort direction indicates whether sorting is performed in ascending or descending order. 當您想要排序的內容通常使用這個方法控制項從外部控制項，例如從不同的控制項在頁面上。You typically use this method when you want to sort the contents of the control from outside the control, such as from a different control on the page. 這個方法也用來以程式設計方式設定的預設排序次序控制第一次呈現時。This method is also used to programmatically set a default sort order for the control when it is first rendered. 這個方法會引發和事件。This method raises the and events. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來以程式設計的方式排序依多個資料欄位的控制項。The following example shows how to use the method to programmatically sort the control by multiple data fields. remarks.format: ## Remarks 按一下排序按鈕時，會引發事件或呼叫的方法，之後控制項負責排序作業。The event is raised when a Sort button is clicked or the method is called, after the control handles the sort operation. (的按鈕控制項的排序按鈕是屬性設定為 「 排序 」。)這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件。(A Sort button is a button control whose property is set to "Sort".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按一下排序按鈕時，會引發事件或呼叫的方法，但之前控制項負責排序作業。The event is raised when a Sort button is clicked or the method is called, but before the control handles the sort operation. (的按鈕控制項的排序按鈕是屬性設定為 「 排序 」。)這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當發生此事件，例如自訂排序運算式。(A Sort button is a button control whose property is set to "Sort".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as customizing the sort expression. A物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷資料行的排序運算式。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the sort expression for the column. 它也可讓您指出應該取消排序作業。It also lets you indicate that the sort operation should be canceled. 若要取消排序作業，請設定屬性物件`true`。To cancel the sort operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何建立事件處理常式事件。The following example shows how create an event handler for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting/CS/ListViewSortingCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting/VB/ListViewSortingVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不支援樣式屬性控制項。Style properties are not supported by the control. 如果您嘗試設定屬性，擲回例外狀況。If you try to set the property, a exception is thrown. 如果您取得的屬性，它會傳回基底類別的對應屬性的預設值。If you get the property, it returns the default value of the corresponding property of the base class. 樣式控制項，您必須設定樣式中的控制項範本使用階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別或內嵌樣式項目。To style the control, you must style the controls inside the templates by using cascading style sheets (CSS) classes or inline style elements.

summary.span: 在資料來源中更新指定之索引上的資料錄。

span.span: Updates the record at the specified index in the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來以程式設計方式更新資料來源中指定索引處的記錄。Use the method to programmatically update the record at the specified index in the data source. 您通常使用這個方法，當您想要更新的記錄外控制，例如來自不同頁面上的控制項。You typically use this method when you want to update a record from outside the control, such as from a different control on the page. > [!NOTE] > 只針對包含雙向資料繫結的輸入的控制項的項目，就可以呼叫這個方法。This method can be called only for an item that contains a two-way data-bound input control. 如需雙向繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱[繫結至資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information about two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). 若要指定是否要將頁面驗證執行更新作業之前，請使用`causesValidation`參數。To specify whether page validation is performed before the update operation, use the `causesValidation` parameter. 這個方法會引發和事件。This method raises the and events. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來以程式設計方式更新資料來源中的項目。The following example shows how to use the method to programmatically update a item in the data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem/CS/ListViewUpdateItemCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem/VB/ListViewUpdateItemVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性會導致模型繫結來做為資料繫結方法。Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data-binding method. 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data).
